feed.title: Bisanz Lab Website
feed.subtitle: Website of the Bisanz Lab interested in the gut microbiome, drugs, toxins, and diet.

entry.title: Susan’s manuscript is out in CHM

link.title: Susan’s manuscript is out in CHM

entry.content: Susan’s valiant effort to design and then deconstruct a synthetic microbiota to inhibit C. difficile is out this month in Cell Host & Microbe. Read more about it at the Scientist.
entry.summary: Susan’s valiant effort to design and then deconstruct a synthetic microbiota to inhibit C. difficile is out this month in Cell Host & Microbe. Read more about it at the Scientist.
